item.title: Vegan Quinoa Chili
item.description: I spent a couple of years practicing a vegetarian diet. This was my favorite take away from that era. Ingredients 1 container (2 1/2 cup 125mls ea.), Chick Peas 1 tablespoon, Oil - Olive 1 small, Onions - Raw 3 clove, Garlic - Raw 1 pepper, Peppers - Jalapeno, raw 1 large (7-1/4" to 8-1/2" long), Carrots - Raw 2 stalk large (11"-12" long), Celery - Raw 1 medium (8oz), Green Bell Pepper 1 pepper, Red Bell Pepper 1 cup, chopped, Squash - Zucchini, includes skin, raw 2 cup, Beans - Kidney, canned 2 cup, Organic Black Beans Canned 2 cup, Canned Diced Tomatoes 2 cup, Tomato Sauce - Crushed Tomatoes 3 tbsp, Spices - Chili powder 1 tsp, Ground Cumin 0.
